green_dust.name: green dust
green_dust.description: Like your everyday's wire but green.

generator.name: generator
generator.description: Generates power out of air molecules.

constant_generator.name: constant generator
constant_generator.description: Generates a set power amount out of air molecules.

copper.name: copper
copper.description: Used for manipulation with batteries, extenders, torches and more.

concrete.name: concrete
concrete.description: Does nothing for the world, like a communist.

torch.name: torch
torch.description: Generator which can be turned on/off with powered copper.

sender.name: sender
sender.description: Sends power to receivers and radio lamps.

radio_lamp.name: radio lamp
radio_lamp.description: Lights up when recieving a signal.

tunnel.name: tunnel
tunnel.description: Redirects signals to go a specific way.

pass.name: pass
pass.description: Allows power to go through when it's equal to or higher than a set value.

rev_pass.name: reverse pass
rev_pass.description: Allows power to go through when it's equal to or lower than a set value.

battery.name: battery
battery.description: Stores and releases energy when reacting with powered copper.

switch.name: switch
switch.description: Toggles on/off when a powered copper block is next to it.

button.name: button
button.description: Sents out a short signal when toggled.

bridge.name: bridge
bridge.description: Allows signals to go straight through each other.

multi_bridge.name: multi bridge
multi_bridge.description: Allows signals to go straight through each other.

laser_sensor.name: laser sensor
laser_sensor.description: Powers up when hit with a laser beam.

Ids.NEEDHELP: Need help? Join our discord or email us at support@dkopal.xyz
